dashboard.the_30_million_$zkl: The 30 million $ZKL will be distributed over at least Three Epochs.
dashboard.determined_by_tooltip1: Every day, users can spin the roulette up to X times to win zkLink Nova Trademark NFTs and Holding Points. The value of X is determined by the number of consecutive days the users have logged in and spun the roulette, with a maximum of 7.
dashboard.determined_by_tooltip2: X = min(7, consecutive days of spinning)
dashboard.daily_roulette_desc: On a daily basis, each user has x times of opportunity to participate in a Roulette game on the campaign page. Users have the probability to win trademarks and Lynks. The minimum reward will be 1 Nova Points.
dashboard.invite_box_points_tooltip: Equivalent to depositing 1 ETH into Nova for ~{{num}} days
dashboard.invite_box_desc: With each referral, users have a chance to randomly draw one of the invite rewards. Invite reward boxes are Nova Points that will be directly added to your Holdings. Please note that Holding points are not NFTs.
dashboard.switch_to_nova: Switch to Nova Network To Draw
dashboard.next_zkl_allocation_lv_tooltip: This sector will allocate 3,000,000 $ZKL after reaching the next milestone.
dashboard.no_milestone_text: This sector currently doesn't have a milestone, so the $ZKL allocation will grow contingently.
dashboard.nova_sbt_desc: Users who deposit a minimum amount of 0.1 ETH or equivalent can mint a zkLink Nova SBT.
dashboard.nova_lynks_desc: Collect ONE OF EACH of the four different types of Trademark NFTs to upgrade your SBT to Lynks.
dashboard.oak_tree_roots_desc: You can earn Oak Tree Roots by participating in the daily roulette or purchasing from OKX
dashboard.magnifying_glass_desc: You can earn Magnifying Glass by participating in the daily roulette or purchasing from OKX
dashboard.chess_knight_desc: You can earn Chess Knight by participating in the daily roulette or purchasing from OKX
dashboard.binary_code_metrix_cube_desc: You can earn Binary Code Metrix Cube by participating in the daily roulette or purchasing from OKX

leaderboard.points_leaderboard_desc: The leaderboard is organized by sectors. In Season II, Nova Points will measure users' contributions to each sector. These points will determine the distribution of $ZKL rewards from each sector's prize pool.

bridge.nova_points_tooltip: By depositing into zkLink Nova, the Nova Points you'll earn every 8 hours.
